text: Joaquim Torra i Pla (born 28 December 1962) is a Catalan nationalist politician, lawyer and editor. Torra was a member of the Parliament of Catalonia from 2018 to 2020 and is the 131st President of Catalonia since May 2018. Torra was elected to the Parliament of Catalonia at the 2017 regional election as an independent candidate for the pro-independence Junts per Catalunya electoral alliance. In May 2018 he was elected 131st President of Catalonia after the Spanish courts blocked three other candidates. In March 2020, Torra tested positive for COVID-19 during the 2020 coronavirus pandemic.Quim Torra da positivo en las pruebas de coronavirus In September 2020, he was removed from office. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish lawyers Category:Presidents of the Government of Catalonia Category:Autonomous University of Barcelona alumni
title: Quim Torra
